snippet: The Spoleto Festival USA presented a new opera by a Chinese composer as well as the American premiere of three pieces by John Cage.
abstract: Allan Kozinn reviews musical performances at the Spoleto Festival USA in Charleston, SC.
lead_paragraph: The Spoleto Festival USA presented a new opera by a Chinese composer as well as the American premiere of three pieces by John Cage.

headline.seo: New Works Enliven Spoleto Festival USA
headline.main: All the World On a Stage In America
headline.print_headline: All the World On a Stage In America
